sponsors.marquee: Bringing art, community, and virtual reality together. (150-characters max)
sponsors.name: Wherehol
sponsors.intro: ***Company Description (1000-character max):*** Since 2017, Wherehol has been at the forefront of virtual reality technology, developing dynamic and immersive experiences for all audiences. Our newest endeavor—VR for Great—brings art, community, and virtual reality together to create an experience like none other. Our intuitive products allow users to dive head first into any art collection and be completely immersed in content creation. Pushing the typical boundaries of VR, Wherehol has partnered with scores of international artists to bring a fresh, new, art-first twist to the virtual world.
sponsors.title: Wherehol

sponsors.marquee: We delivered 5G first. Are you ready for what’s next? (150-characters max)
sponsors.name: Mobility
sponsors.intro: ***Company Description (1000-character max):*** At Mobility, we offer voice, data and video services across our award-winning network, keeping security and reliability at the core of our services. With 5G now blanketing the nation, only Mobility is able to link-up with thousands of mobile hubs in microseconds, ensuring your connections are delivered at near lightning speed. Using innovative communication coding and cutting-edge hardware, our technologies allow customers to connect across around the world faster and more efficiently than even we dreamed possible. And not only are we working toward a faster future, we are committed to making it a more sustainable planet. As you’ve seen in our recent ads and social media posts, reducing Mobility’s carbon footprint is at the top of our list ensuring future generations have a brighter, safer and more connected experience with Mobility.
sponsors.title: Mobility

sponsors.marquee: Travel + Technology. Book your next evolved escape with Treva. (150-characters max)
sponsors.name: Treva
sponsors.intro: ***Company Description (1000-character max):*** Travel + Technology = Another Tremendous Trip. Since its inception in 2004, Treva has integrated more than 20 new technologies into their travel services. Services like facial recognition for seamless online check-in, 360º VR room tours, housekeeping based on geofencing, linen fragrancing based on skin analysis, and one-touch room service ordered via mobile device only begin to scratch the surface. Each quarter, Treva adds more technical integrations to better streamlined core competencies. When a traveler books their next escape with Treva, they know they’re using technology to level up their adventure. Virtually connect with a Treva travel agent today!
sponsors.title: Treva
